page.description: Specify if the UX Component should be saved as a binary file or as formatted JSON.

discussion.p: UX Components can be saved as formatted JSON or binary data. Formatted JSON saves the properties in clear text. This is useful if you are using some type of source or version control system and the system has a method to show differences between versions.
The compiled file used to publish the UX is always saved as binary. This is because a binary file has a smaller size than a JSON file.

item.name: Binary
item.description: Saves the UX Component in a binary format. This is the default format used to save UX Components.

item.name: Formatted JSON
item.description: Saves the UX Component as formatted JSON. This is useful if you are using some type of source control or version control system that has tools for displaying differences between versions.
